name: Recipe Finder with Gemini AI

name: Payment-Services-Flutter

description: Developed an E-learning app with features like user authentication, error handling, animations, user profile, and settings.

name: To-Do-Flutter
description: This is a productivity application designed to help users organize and manage their daily tasks efficiently. This app allows users to create, edit, and remove tasks effortlessly while offering tools to track progress. Users can categorize tasks. The app boasts a clean and modern user interface. Built using Flutter and GetX for state management, it follows the MVC architecture for maintainable and scalable code. Data is stored securely using Get Storage and Shared Preferences, ensuring offline functionality. enhanced by Figma-based designs.
